mapper.select: SELECT co_key.co_code,review.review_score,keyword.key_name,company.co_name, detail.* FROM co_key JOIN detail ON detail.co_code = co_key.co_code JOIN keyword ON co_key.key_code = keyword.key_code LEFT JOIN review ON co_key.co_code = review.co_code JOIN company ON co_key.co_code = company.co_code WHERE keyword.key_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') LIMIT #{offset},#{perPage}

SELECT detail.*,co_key.cate_code,co_key.key_code,keyword.key_name FROM detail JOIN co_key ON co_key.co_code = detail.co_code JOIN keyword ON co_key.key_code = keyword.key_code WHERE co_key.co_code = #{coCode}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO detail VALUES (#{coCode},#{detailContents},NOW(), default, #{detailShorts})
SELECT co_code FROM detail WHERE co_code=#{coCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE detail SET detail_contents = #{detailContents} WHERE co_code = #{coCode}
